page.title: 09Voluntary Organisations
page.content: There are the national organisations which run voluntary services in Malmesbury. These are The{Womens Royal {Voluntary Service}and{The Red Cross. The{W.R.V.S}runs Meals on Wheels, which caters for people unable to cope after returning home from hospital, Luncheon Club for people over sixty, library book service at the local hospital, Good Companions which includes home visits for the elderly, The Trolley Shop and coffee, both of which are again run at the hospital, Clinic for children, childrens holidays and clothing which distributes clothes to the poor and needy. {The Red Cross}runs the Handicapped Club, Blood Donors and Hospital Advice centre. Other clubs include The Round Table, The Lions and The Tea Pot (65+).
